summary:
Journalist with thorough experience as a reporter, editor and manager in various domains, and sociologist, author in the field of journalism studies. Teacher and trainer in investigative journalism and data analysis. Aim, apart from doing my job well: making journalists (better) professionals. Interested in newsroom culture, management and organisation, and the future of journalism.

Specialties: Data journalism, social analysis, editorial systems.
